summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Prosch Avenue West from 13th Avenue West to West Barrett Street; and certain other streets, alleys and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15394 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
